name: Pocket Hose Silver Bullet 50 ft Turbo Shot Nozzle Multiple Spray Patterns Expandable Garden Hose 3/4 in Solid Aluminum Fittings Lead-Free Lightweight and No-Kink,Black
short_description: Lead-Free Connectors: Pocket Hose Silver Bullet features lead-free connectors that make the garden hose suitable for drinking and supplying water to animals. .Pocket Hose Silver Bullet includes a removable spray nozzle with 3 spray settings.Pocket Hose Silver Bullet coils and can store in a drawer or on a shelf, there’s no need to purchase a separate hose reel.Included: One (1) Pocket Hose Silver Bullet with Turbo Shot Jet Nozzle. 50 F
Expandable Hose: The expandable garden hose expands to a full-size water hose when you turn the water on and shrinks back down to a Pocket Hose when you turn the water off.
Durable Outer Shell: Pocket Hose Silver Bullet’s exclusive Bullet Shell outer casing won’t snag, tear, or wear; inner tubing is kink-proof.
Lightweight: Rubber garden hoses are such a pain to move around your garden. Pocket Hose Silver Bullet is super-lightweight and easy to maneuver around your lawn and garden.
Pocket Hose Silver Bullet includes a removable spray nozzle with 3 spray settings.
Pocket Hose Silver Bullet coils and can store in a drawer or on a shelf, there’s no need to purchase a separate hose reel.
Included: One (1) Pocket Hose Silver Bullet with Turbo Shot Jet Nozzle. 50 Ft.
product_description: Lightweight, expandable hose. Watering your lawn is such a hassle. That heavy rubber garden hose is tough to move around your yard. Why are you still wrangling those outdated hoses? From the makers of Pocket Hose Brass Bullet hose comes the newest lightweight expanding hose, the Pocket Hose Silver Bullet. It’s so easy to use. Just turn on the water and watch Silver Bullet grow into a full-size flexible hose. When you’re finished watering your lawn, simply turn off the water and Silver Bullet shrinks itself dry.

name: Garden Hose 50ft, Made of TPE(Not PVC), Ultra-Light & Flexible Water Hose with Solid Brass Fittings, Non-Shrinking, Easy to Storage, Drinking Water Safe Material, All-weather, SeaBlue
short_description: [ Unique to the Market, Made of TPE instead of PVC ] Unlike other fabric hoses which are made of PVC, the inner tube of Gnimihz flat hose is made of TPE. Compared to PVC hose, which is prone to bursting, not durable and unsafe, TPE has good aging-resistance and high tearing strength due to the characteristics of the material itself, and TPE is much-safer than PVC. (TPE is generally considered-safe, while PVC is classified as a possible car ci no g en (class 3) by-I A R C.)
[ Safe-Material ] The material of the water hose is BPA-free and phthalate-free. The hose won't leave a strong plastic taste in your water.

[ Swivel-Handle & Effortless ] The movable handle allows the hose to rotate freely without twisting the entire hose to prevent twisting. The handle can also fix the brass fitting to make the connection with faucet/nozzle/sprinkler more easily and effortlessly.

[ Lightweight, Compact, Easy to Carry ] Up to 65% lighter and 68% less storage space than conventional garden hoses. This water Hose is extra flexible, lightweight and compact for simple storage, perfect for garden, RV and marine use. Whether moving through different parts of the garden or switching between locations, handling them is effortless.

[ 10 Patterns Sprayer Nozzle ] The sprayer nozzle is made of zinc alloy and ABS, which is more durable than ordinary plastic nozzles. Whether you need a jet to clean a hard surface or a soft delicate shower to water the garden, this nozzle has you covered. It has spray pattern options for every watering need, including fan, mist, soaker, jet, and you can change the pattern easily with a twist of the head disk.

[ Durable Garden Hose ] Rugged, marine-grade fiber jacket construction surrounding a flexible TPE inner core. The rip- and abrasion-resistant outer fabric helps maintain the hose's shape and protect it from breaks, cracks and leaks. This garden hose can withstand up to 600PSI burst pressure and 200PSI working pressure. Top-level strengthen hose than similar.

[ Solid Brass Fittings ] Gnimihz garden hose is equipped with heavy-duty 100% solid brass 3/4" GHT Female and Male ends that are Leak-free, anti-rust, and break-proof. Fits all standard taps, spray nozzle, lawn sprinkler, watering timer, and watering wand.

[ All-Weather Flexibility ] Maintains flexibility down to -22 degrees Fahrenheit and can be used in temperatures up to 150 degrees Fahrenheit. Ordinary PVC hose has poor-resistance to low and high temperatures, and the hose loses performance under temperature changes, which can damage it. TPE's superior freeze-resistance provides durability to the hose.

[ 2-Year Warranty ] Backed by a 2-Year Warranty. We stand behind our products. We have confidence in this Garden Hose, but if you are not completely satisfied, please do not hesitate to CONTACT-US, as we will offer you a FULL-REFUND or a REPLACEMENT.

name: Pocket Hose Silver Bullet 2.0 Expandable Garden Hose 100-FT with Turbo Shot Nozzle, AS-SEEN-ON-TV, Lead-Free, Solid Aluminum Connectors, Easy On/Off Valve, Kink-Free, Leak-Proof
short_description: AS-SEEN-ON-TV POCKET HOSE: The Original Hose That Grows with over 126 worldwide patents

EXPANDS: Turn the water on and Pocket Hose Silver Bullet grows into a full-size garden hose with a powerful ¾” flow diameter. DISCLAIMER: For the hose to fully expand, do not turn the shut-off valve to the "on" position until after turning the water spigot on and allowing water to flow through the hose.
CONTRACTS: Turn off the water and watch the Pocket Hose Silver Bullet shrink right back to pocket size, making it super-easy to store anywhere
LIGHTWEIGHT: Ultra-lightweight and compact, the Pocket Hose Silver Bullet is easy to use and store
STRONG: Pocket Hose Silver Bullet’s interior hose is made of 3 layers of High-Strength Latex to prevent bursts, leaks, and kinks!
SEAMLESS OUTER SHELL: The Silver Bullet’s outer shell is made with one continuous weave which helps resist tears, snags, and leaks
EASY ON/OFF VALVE: With Pocket Hose Silver Bullet, you can easily turn the water on or off — perfect with or without an attached nozzle!
LEAD-FREE: Did you know most brass hose fittings contain lead? That can be dangerous! Pocket Hose is lead-free and drinking water safe for you and your family
TURBO SHOT NOZZLE INCLUDED: Pocket Hose Silver Bullet includes a BONUS Turbo Shot nozzle with three adjustable settings; pinpoint, fine mist, or full-power stream
CONNECTOR PROTECTORS: Both ends are equipped with connector protectors which help relieve stress and strain at the hose ends
product_description: Lightweight, expandable hose. Watering your lawn is such a hassle. That heavy rubber garden hose is tough to move around your yard. Why are you still wrangling those outdated hoses? From the makers of Pocket Hose Brass Bullet hose comes the newest lightweight expanding hose, the Pocket Hose Silver Bullet. It’s so easy to use. Just turn on the water and watch Silver Bullet grow into a full-size flexible hose. When you’re finished watering your lawn, simply turn off the water and Silver Bullet shrinks itself dry.

name: 50ft 304 Stainless Steel Garden Hose Metal, Heavy Duty Water Pipe with Nozzles for Yard, Outdoor - Flexible, Never Kink & Tangle, Puncture Resistant (Sliver)
short_description: Durable Garden Hose: Made of 304 stainless steel and multi-layer flexible inner tube, its structure is stronger than traditional rubber water pipes. Also it can withstand dog bite, dragging through wall edges and ground and will not break, crack or leak
Non-kinking: 50 ft flexible garden hose metal is extremely flexible. Non-kinking and tangle, lightweight, wear resistance and corrosion resistance. Easy to coil up and store
No Leakage: Both ends are equipped with rubber gaskets, which are tightly sealed to prevent the hose from leaking. NOTE: please drain water from hose if not used for a long time

Upgrage 8 Ways Nozzle: The outer layer of the spray is wrapped with rubber, which is comfortable to grip, durable and non-leakage. The thumb can control the size of the water flow, making it more convenient to use
Support: If you encounter any issues with the hose you receive, or experience any problems during use, please contact us. We will try our best to resolve the issues

name: Pocket Hose Copper Head w/New Pocket Pivot Expandable Garden Hose 100FT, AS-SEEN-ON-TV, Swivels 360°, Advanced Tri-Tex Tubing & Force Field Jacket, 3X Stronger, Lead-Free, No-Kink, Anti-Burst w/APT
short_description: NEW POCKET PIVOT: The Pocket Hose Copper Head features an innovative Pocket Pivot that swivels 180° to 360°, reducing strain and preventing creases at the spigot

FORCE FIELD JACKET: The Pocket Hose Copper Head is encased in a proprietary, ultra-tough Force Field Jacket that is 3 times stronger than previous models, ensuring exceptional durability and resistance to wear and tear

TRI-TEX TUBING: Reinforced with advanced Tri-Tex tubing, the Pocket Hose Copper Head has three separate layers of high-strength latex, ensuring a reliable and consistent water flow while preventing leaks and bursts even under high water pressure

APT CONNECTORS: The Pocket Hose Copper Head’s connection points are both protected by state-of-the-art APT (Advanced Polymer Technology) designed to provide a secure and leak-proof connection, enhancing the hose's overall durability
INFUSED WITH REAL COPPER AND LEAD-FREE: Infused with real copper, it’s lead-free and drinking water safe, making it ideal for your plants, your pets, and the planet

KINK-PROOF DESIGN: Engineered with advanced kink-proof construction, this hose ensures uninterrupted water flow by preventing tangles and twists, providing a hassle-free watering experience every time
¾ INCH DIAMETER AND ANTI-BURST: Pocket Hose Copper Head grows to a full ¾ diameter hose, and it can handle up to a whopping 650 PSI, giving you full power
LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN: Weighing less than three pounds, this hose is exceptionally easy to maneuver and transport, reducing user fatigue and making garden tasks more manageable and efficient
10-PATTERN SPRAY NOZZLE: The 10-pattern spray nozzle is included, ensuring the perfect pattern for various gardening tasks
Available in sizes 25 ft, 50 ft, 75 ft, and 100 ft

name: Flexi Hose with 8 Function Nozzle, 100FT - Lightweight Expandable Garden Hose, No-Kink Flexibility, 3/4 Inch Solid Brass Fittings and Double Latex Core
short_description: The Flexi Hose expandable garden hose automatically expands to the stated product length - roughly 3 times extension - with standard pressure when water is turned on and shortens to compact length when the water is turned off. Storing the Flexi Hose is a breeze!
Strong fittings for reliability! Solid 3/4 inch brass connectors ensure the expanding garden water pipe fits the typical outdoor garden taps in the US.
Expandable, lightweight construction without sacrificing quality! The 3750D elastic outer fabric with 4 layers of latex protects the inner tube effectively from thorns, punctures, and sharp corners.
Lightweight, yet durable for heavy duty use! Every Flexi Hose is endurance-tested to 2000 uses and can withstand water pressures up to 12 bar and temperatures between 41 and 113 degrees fahrenheit.
The included 8-pattern rotating hose spray nozzle is constructed out of durable ABS plastic and features an ergonomic, slip-resistant rubberized handle for comfort.

name: Giraffe Tools Garden Hose 25FT Lightweight Lay Flat Water Hose Kink Free Flexible Hose with 9 Spray Function Nozzle（Black）
short_description: 50% Lighter Weight: The inner tube of the garden hose is made of high-strength PVC material, which is 50% lighter than a standard garden hose and is easier to use

Durability and Kink Free: High strength polyester silk, can efficiently protect the pipe. Explosion-proof PVC material makes the water pipe durable. The water hose can be folded arbitrarily without kinking
Aluminum Connector: The garden hose is equipped with Hexagonal 3/4-inch American connector and rubber gasket design to prevent leakage, has excellent corrosion resistance and does not rust
9 Adjustable Spray Patterns: Garden Hose nozzle supports 9 patterns to fulfill your different watering purposes. You can adjust the water volume and size with the push of a button

Wide Application: Giraffe Tools garden hoses are available in a variety of specialty lengths to meet your needs, not only for garden, yard and lawn watering, but also for car washes, home and livestock, and professional use
24-Month Warranty and Service: Contact us to get timely solution & lifetime friendly customer support. Giraffe Tools promises to solve all your problems in the professional way

name: Expandable Garden Hose 50 ft with 10 Function Spray Nozzle - New Patented Water Hose with 40 Layers of Innovative Nano Rubber - Lightweight, Durable, Flexible, 50ft Retractable Stretch Hose
short_description: EXPANDABLE GARDEN HOSE: Adimos water hose is incredibly lightweight, flexible, and functional. When the water pressure is turned on, our flexible garden hose expands to 50 feet in just a few seconds and quickly contracts to a compact size when the water is turned off. Ensure that the water flow is sufficient to reach the full length.

UPGRADED QUALITY MATERIAL: The 50 feet retractable garden hose inner layer is made of high-density innovative natural rubber and burst-resistant polyester woven fiber yarn, making it more extensible and less deformable. The outer layer is made of dirt- and abrasion-resistant anti-aging nano-material, easy to clean and dry, which can effectively prevent breakage and leakage and is not easily torn and punctured by sharp objects

NO MORE LEAKS: This flexible garden hose comes with high quality 3/4 inch American standard sturdy brass fittings and leak-proof rubber gaskets. So you won't have to worry about your hose rusting, leaking, or cracking, which can waste water and damage your plants. The hose is compatible with different watering tools such as sprinklers, nozzles, and faucets, and can connect to different water sources like outdoor faucets and indoor sinks.

10 FUNCTIONAL HOSE NOZZLE - Compared to common 8 pattern hose nozzles, our 10 patterned nozzles are better to meet all your watering and washing needs. Even includes a water pressure valve attachment, easily adjusting the pressure or shutting it off. The ergonomic rubber handle makes this sprayer very comfortable to hold and also prevents slipping.

EASY TO USE AND STORE: Light weight, portable, can easily go around obstacles, flexible and non-kinked, easy to install, soft and durable, only 2.9 pounds also suitable for children, the elderly and people who can not lift heavy objects. When not filled with water, the hose is compact. To extend the service life, when not in use for a long time, please drain the water from the hose and place it in a cool place, avoiding direct sunlight
product_description: Expandable Garden Hose 50 ft with 10 Function Spray Nozzle - New Patented Water Hose with 40 Layers of Innovative Nano Rubber - Lightweight, Durable, Flexible, 50ft Retractable Stretch Hose
